attributes.action: fund Exjade for sickle cell sufferers on chronic blood transfusion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Exjade has been trialled by children as young as 5 in the UK. The drug has been sucessful in removing excess iron from their bodies, now there is bickering amongst PCT's as to who should foot the bill for the children to stay on the drug. Leaving many others who were not part of the trial without a hope.

government_responses.details:
